thread.title: New Fan Blog Launches Dedicated To 350z Aftermarket Products
thread.title_full: New Fan Blog Launches Dedicated To 350z Aftermarket Products

author: prbuzz.com
title: New Fan Blog Launches Dedicated To 350z Aftermarket Products
text:
HARRISBURG, PA, September 2, 2015 – A new fan blog dedicated to reviewing and discussing Nissan 350Z aftermarket products has recently launched on Tumblr.
350Z Header Review, a new blog appealing to owners and fans of the Nissan 350Z, has recently launched on Tumblr with a specific focus on reviewing and discussing 350Z aftermarket products. In addition to unbiased, topical and informative posts on various 350Z aftermarket performance products, the blog also includes ancillary information of interest to car enthusiasts, such as announcing car meets and cruises. The owners of the blog also intend to host their own proprietary meets and cruises for fans, details of which will be announced on the blog.
“After I bought my Nissan 350Z, I noticed a serious dearth in the market for independent, reliable information on 350Z aftermarket products,” commented the owner of 350Z Header Review. “I thought to myself, if no one else is doing it, why don’t I? That’s when I created 350Z Header Review and dedicated my efforts to providing readers with unbiased, quality 350Z aftermarket product reviews and information.”
While still relatively new, the blog has attracted plenty of attention from Nissan 350Z owners and car enthusiasts alike; daily, the blog receives over 1,000 visits.
For the latest information and news concerning the Nissan 350Z and related aftermarket products, please visit http://350Zheaderreview.tumblr.com.
About 350Z Header Review
350Z Header Review is a blog hosted on Tumblr that discusses and reviews aftermarket products for the Nissan 350Z as well as related meets and cruises.
